alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 12:49PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW LAKE EFFECT WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON AND FAR NORTHERN LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of moderate to heavy lake effect snow continues to move slowly north across northern Jefferson county, extending into far northern Lewis county. This lake effect snow band will produce snowfall rates of up to an inch per hour and visibility locally reduced to a half mile or less at times. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Clayton, Dexter, Glen Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Sackets Harbor, Black River, Philadelphia, Brownville, Alexandria Bay, Theresa, Cape Vincent, Antwerp, Harrisville, Chaumont, and Evans Mills. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 45 and 52. Most of the snow for the Watertown and Fort Drum areas will taper off between 1 and 3 PM. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
